headlines.description: Bruno Fernandes scored a hat trick as Manchester United thrashed old rivals Leeds United 5-1 at Old Trafford on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fernandes nets hat trick as Man Utd smash Leeds

headlines.description: — Neal Maupay and Alexis Mac Allister scored second-half goals as Brighton came from behind to beat Burnley 2-1 away Saturday in their Premier League opener.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brighton rallies to beat Burnley 2-1 in Premier League

headlines.description: Christian Pulisic fired Chelsea to a 3-0 win at Stamford Bridge on Saturday against Crystal Palace.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pulisic fires Chelsea to victory over Crystal Palace

headlines.description: Everton rallied from a goal down to beat Southampton 3-1 in the Premier League as manager Rafa Benitez enjoyed a winning start to his reign.
headlines.shortLinkText: Benitez begins Everton reign with victory

headlines.description: Leicester City got their Premier League campaign underway with a 1-0 home win over Wolverhampton Wanderers.
headlines.shortLinkText: Vardy pounces to give Leicester 1-0 win

headlines.description: — Watford record signing Ismaila Sarr starred on his Premier League return as the Hornets held off a late challenge from Aston Villa to secure a 3-2 win on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sarr stars for Watford as Villa struggles without Grealish

headlines.description: Liverpool kicked off their 2021-22 Premier League campaign with a straightforward win over Norwich City at Carrow Road on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool ease past Norwich in Prem opener
